comments.author: милена камбурова

comments.text:
Debbie Reynolds has related that while she was filming this sequence with 
Kelly and O'Connor, she was sobbing on an MGM sound stage because she 
didn't believe that she could equal the extraordinary expertise of her 
co-stars. Fred Astaire, who was also filming on the lot, heard her and 
said, "Debbie, I never let anyone watch me rehearse, but I want you to see 
my process". He proceeded to experiment with numbers from The Band Wagon 
and he was sweating and exhausted; Astaire then said to Reynolds-" Now you 
see the amount of work that it takes to make these numbers look 
effortless". Reynolds, with a new appreciation for the work, completed her 
work on this iconic film. ﻿

bastante cine europeo.
